segments.text: Would you like a piece of birthday cake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks , I'll pass . It looks very tempting though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought strawberry cake with cream cheese frosting was your favorite ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is . I'm on a diet and strawberry cream cheese cake is not on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A diet ? What for ? You are in great shape .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to the doctor the other day . My cholesterol is up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not too serious . But he gave me a strict diet to help bring it down .
segments.speaker: S2
